item.title: #tidytuesday
item.description: #TidyTuesday and I looked at video games franchises and revenue just from the actual video games: Second submission for this week’s #TidyTuesday, training my circular plot muscles for another challenge :) The labels above the circles are tiny, couldn’t come up with any better solution, any feedback or idea is welcome! code: https://github.com/gkaramanis/tidytuesday/tree/master/week-27
